response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value, is now available for acquisition. I understand that its worth may be subjective, but I am confident it will significantly benefit you. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic chance to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 750000}
